name: DualPenSports™
description:
Try out a surprising new experience with DualPenSports on Nintendo 3DS from Namco Bandai Games Inc. In this exciting new title you’ll control the action using not one, but two styluses on the Touch Screen – for a fresh new control scheme and a novel coordination challenge to boot.

The fun of DualPenSports can be fast and furious or controlled and considered, depending on which of the seven sports minigames you’re trying to master. You can choose from archery, football penalty shoot-outs, boxing and baseball, among others. Each sport offers uniquely addictive gameplay to keep you coming back for more, all in glorious 3D.
